page.title: 18A SPORTS CLUB, HARROW.
page.content:
{Parkfield Social Club}is a very successful sports club with 90 cricketers and 200 footballers. It holds family social events and has given its support to an injured local sportsman. Since its formation in 1941, it has grown from 2 to 15 football teams and 4 cricket teams. Its members come from a 5 mile radius. Juniors pay Â£14 per season and Seniors pay Â£2 per match. The club is solvent.
Two better known players are {Roderick Thomas}who is an England Youth Player and{Robert Moss}who played for Fulham in the 1960's.
Originally, it was known as{Harrow {Weald Boys Club}but changed its name in 1945.
